name: LinkPreview.Root

openDelay.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to delay opening the preview when hovering over the trigger.
openDelay.description_zh: The amount of time in milliseconds to delay opening the preview when hovering over the trigger.

closeDelay.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to delay closing the preview when the mouse leaves the trigger.
closeDelay.description_zh: The amount of time in milliseconds to delay closing the preview when the mouse leaves the trigger.

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether or not to close the preview when clicking outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: Whether or not to close the preview when clicking outside of it.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether or not to close the preview when pressing the escape key.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: Whether or not to close the preview when pressing the escape key.

open.description: The open state of the link preview component.
open.description_zh: The open state of the link preview component.

onOpenChange.description: A callback that fires when the open state changes.
onOpenChange.description_zh: A callback that fires when the open state changes.

portal.description: Where to render the link preview when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: Where to render the link preview when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null

onOutsideClick.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
onOutsideClick.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

description: The root component used to manage the state of the state of the link preview.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
